name: Bomber Ace: WW2 war plane game
name_original: Bomber Ace: WW2 war plane game
description: This realistic shooting game immerses you into World War II air battles: drop bombs on enemy armored trucks, tanks, anti-aircraft vehicles, radars and warships, shoot enemy aircrafts, avoid homing missiles. Earn money and upgrade your plane's engine, armor and wings. Install new air cannons and bombs on your plane, upgrade your weapons, build your squadron. You'll start with basic airplane and gradually get to modern jet fighter. If you want to dive into the world of warplanes and warships, feel 1939-1945 fights and air duels, then this arcade warplane simulator game is for you.
